content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Howdy!!

Using an enthusiastic and friendly approach can further the conversation by creating a welcoming environment that encourages open exploration of ideas and prompts a lively exchange of concepts. This dynamic atmosphere can lead participants to share more creative thoughts and inspirations as they feel more comfortable engaging with the process.
